portfolio.title: Canteen POS
portfolio.description: The canteen system, developed in NetBeans with Java Ant, features a user-friendly interface. It efficiently manages orders and payments, providing a reliable solution for busy canteens.

portfolio.title: Snap Pay
portfolio.description: Snap Pay is a lightweight payment processing system with no database. It is developed in NetBeans, making it ideal for small businesses or personal use due to its simplicity and ease of use.

portfolio.title: Auz Ai
portfolio.description: Auz Ai is still developing, constantly learning and improving. it is a friendly digital helper, here to chat, answer questions, explore ideas, and navigate this exciting journey of discovery alongside you!
